mapper.select: select * from p1_market where code =#{code} AND qty>0
select count(*) from p1_market where qty>0
select count(*) from p1_market where qty=0

select m.no, m.name,o.qty,m.price from p1_market m inner join (select c.item_no,sum(o.qty) as qty from p1_cart c inner join p1_order o on c.no = o.cart_no group by c.item_no) o on m.no = o.item_no where m.qty=0
